SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path to config file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_MCO_CONFIG#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Nodes" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_NODES#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Concurrency limit" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_CONCURRENCY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Buidling Puppet run command -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = "mco puppet runall &UC4RB_PUP_CONCURRENCY# --verbose"
! config file of mcollective : IF &UC4RB_PUP_MCO_CONFIG# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_MCO_CONFIG# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -c &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! List of nodes : IF &UC4RB_PUP_NODES# <> "" : SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_PUP_NODES#)
: SET &COMMA_POS#=STR_FIND(&UC4RB_PUP_NODES#, ",") : IF &COMMA_POS# = 1 : STOP MSG, 51, "Node list cannot start with comma." : ENDIF
: SET &COMMA_POS#=STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_PUP_NODES#, ",") : IF &COMMA_POS# = &LENGTH# : STOP MSG, 51, "Node list cannot end with comma." : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -I ") : SET &UC4RB_PUP_NODES# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_PUP_NODES#,","," -I ") : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, "&UC4RB_PUP_NODES#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# ! Invoking command &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RUN AGENT USING MCOLLECTIVE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RUN AGENT USING MCOLLECTIVE ACTION FAILED. PLEASE CHECK INPUT PARAMETER ********"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
